name: Between Two Worlds (Stephen Hubbard)
description:
WASD to move.

Space to jump,

Right-click to change dimensions. 

Left-click and hold on to some objects to lift them up and move them in between worlds. 

5 levels total. 

Have fun!

This game was made in less than 48 hours as part of the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.   The theme was "Joined Together".

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hubbardgames/
Music Credit:  https://opengameart.org/content/copycat
